original_title: 劇場版　神聖かまってちゃん　ロックンロールは鳴り止まないっ
overview: Yu Irie (8000 MILES 1 & 2) returns with this ambitious flick about an upcoming concert by a reclusive rock group and the managers, obsessed fans, shut-ins, single moms and kindergarten teachers who are affected by it. A true tribute to the healing power of rock and roll.
title: Ringing in Their Ears
